compounddef.title: Core API Interface Common to C and C++

briefdescription.para: Treenods is selected.
Treenods is to be deleted.
Treenods is edited.
Callback event for tree view.
Reference to data.
Reference to XML Node.
Data storage type on form element.
A Rewind button used to indicate select first record.
A Back button used to go one record back.
A Forward button indicating to proceed to next record.
A Fast Forward button used to indicate select lasr record.
A Affirmative button.
A Cancel/No/Undo button.
Define all buttons that are used in creating a panel.

simplesect.para: These buttons are placed in this order at the bottom of the panel buttons not in the mask are not displayed and are blank spaces

briefdescription.para: Button press event.
Enter was pressed in a Combo box.
Combo box text has been updated.
DTS Application event..
Define all possible events that are passed to event handler.
Allow editing of the node.
Allow deleteing the node from right click menu.
Node is a Container.
Container node allows sorting.
Options set on tree nodes.

simplesect.para: Not all options apply to containers and leaf nodes.

briefdescription.para: Panel Type.
Type of list item.
Forward decleration of the application data class.
Forward decleration of wizard class.
Forward definition of form_item.
Forward definition of dynamic_panel.
Define menu as void* it is not exported to API.
Define menuitem as void* it is not exported to API.
Define panel as void* it is not exported to API.
Define notebook as void* it is not exported to API.
Define treeview as void* it is not exported to API.
Define tabview as void* it is not exported to API.
Define treenode as void* it is not exported to API.
Define progress as void* it is not exported to API.
Callback called on application execution.

detaileddescription.para:
The callback is called with the application pointer and supplied userdata
DTSApp::DTSApp()
dtsgui_config()
dtsgui
Application data ptr.
data
Userdata reference.
Returning 0 will cause application execution to fail.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* event_callback)(struct dtsgui *, dtsgui_pane, int type, int, void *)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct dtsgui *, dtsgui_pane, int type, int, void *)
memberdef.name: event_callback

briefdescription.para: Callback run on panel event When a panel event is triggered and a callback has been registered it will be called.

parameterdescription.para: Panel that the event originated on.
Event ID Depends on the event type.
Data attached to the event handler.

simplesect.para: A non zero value to allow further processing of the event.

memberdef.definition: typedef void*(* dtsgui_toolbar_create)(struct dtsgui *, void *, long, int, const char *, void *data)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct dtsgui *, void *, long, int, const char *, void *data)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_toolbar_create

briefdescription.para: Calback to configure and return a wxToolbar objecct.

parameterdescription.para: Style to be supplied to wxToolbar constructor.
Reference to data supplied when setting upt the tool bar.

memberdef.definition: typedef dtsgui_pane(* dtsgui_dynpanel)(struct dtsgui *, const char *, void *)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_dynpanel

briefdescription.para: Callback called when a dynamic menu item is selected This function is called and allows returning a pane to be displayed.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to data set when menu is created.

simplesect.para: If a panel is returned it will be displayed.

memberdef.definition: typedef dtsgui_pane(* dtsgui_tree_cb)(struct dtsgui *, dtsgui_treeview, dtsgui_treenode, enum tree_cbtype, const char *, void *)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct dtsgui *, dtsgui_treeview, dtsgui_treenode, enum tree_cbtype, const char *, void *)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_tree_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback used for tree view events.

parameterdescription.para: Tree node that generated the event.
Userdata refernece of data passed too treeview.

simplesect.para: If a panel is returned it will be placed int the display area.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* dtsgui_treeviewpanel_cb)(dtsgui_pane, dtsgui_treeview, dtsgui_treenode, void *)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_treeviewpanel_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback called after dtsgui_tree_cb to allow configuration of the panel. This callback is stored on the node and allows the panel to be configured per node allowing generic tree callback.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to user data stored on node.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* dtsgui_xmltreenode_cb)(dtsgui_treeview, dtsgui_treenode, struct xml_node *, void *)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_xmltreenode_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback called as part of the creation of a new node. This callback will allow manipulation of the newly created node if required.

parameterdescription.para: Tree view that contains the node.
XML Node assigned to the node.

briefdescription.para: Configure a tab view panel prior to display. Tab panels are dynanic and created as needed by calling this callback.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the config data held by panel.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* dtsgui_tabpane_newdata_cb)(struct xml_doc *, struct xml_node *, void *, void **, int *)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct xml_doc *, struct xml_node *, void *, void **, int *)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_tabpane_newdata_cb

briefdescription.para: Allow setting the configuration data before tab pane is created. This callback is called as part of the new tab creation to allow setting callback data.The position of the pane can also be set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to reference of cdata can be replaced by setting cdata[0] to new reference.
Pointer to integer containing panel position can be overwritten setting *pos.

briefdescription.para: Shortcut flags for navigation buttons.
Shortcut flags for direction buttons.
Shortcut flags for action buttons.
Shortcut flags for all buttons.
Shortcut flags for no buttons.
Core elements shared by all API's.
